name: Pigment's Potions
description:
Hello, and welcome to the page for my college capstone project, "Pigment's Potions." This is the alpha version of my culminating project in my Game Design college program. One of my assignments is to collect player feedback on the game, catalogue the data and analyze it. If you would like to participate, please feel free to download the game. If you could also please fill out my playtest questionnaire at Pigment's Potions Playtest Feedback (google form) I would be very grateful.

Thank you.
